text: her name is Warren Weinstein I'm
addressing this video to President Obama
it has been more than two years since I
was taken prisoner by al-qaeda while I
was working as a consultant on US
government programs in Pakistan and now
over 72 years of age from not in good
health I have a heart condition I suffer
from acute asthma and the years have
taken their toll I have been cut off
from my family my wife was over 70 my
two daughters my two grandchildren my
son-in-law and perhaps new members of
the family whom I have never met
needless to say I have been suffering
deep anxiety every part of every day
nine years ago i came to Pakistan to
help my government and I did so at a
time when most Americans would not come
here and now when I need my government
it seems that I have been totally
abandoned and forgotten mr. Obama you're
a family man and so you understand the
deep mental anxiety and anguish that I
have been experiencing for these past
more than two years and therefore
appealing to you on a humanitarian basis
if nothing else and asking that you take
the necessary actions to expedite my
release from I return to my family into
my country to our country
